name: Endive and Goat Cheese
keywords: endive, goat cheese, pear, side dish, summer, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text:
Sauté 2 or 3 chopped shallots in butter until
soft. Tear 4 heads Belgian endive into pieces and
arrange on a large plate; top with 3 thinly sliced
pears, drained shallots and 4 ounces goat cheese.
Dressing variation: Use red-wine vinegar.
